sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MapPin, Compass, ShoppingBag, Star, Calendar, TrendingUp, Users, Heart, Eye, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; import axios from 'axios'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const { data: userItineraries } = useQuery( 'user-itineraries', () => axios.get('/api/itineraries').then(res => res.data), { enabled: !!user, } ); const { data: userProducts } = useQuery( 'user-products', () => axios.get('/api/marketplace/products').then(res => res.data), { enabled: !!user && user.role === 'vendor', } ); const { data: userServices } = useQuery( 'user-services', () => axios.get('/api/marketplace/services').then(res => res.data), { enabled: !!user && (user.role === 'guide' || user.role === 'vendor'), } ); const stats = [ { icon: Compass, label: 'My Itineraries', value: userItineraries?.total || 0, color: 'blue', link: '/itinerary-planner' }, { icon: Heart, label: 'Favorites', value: 12, color: 'red', link: '/favorites' }, { icon: Eye, label: 'Recently Viewed', value: 8, color: 'green', link: '/recent' }, { icon: Star, label: 'Reviews Given', value: user?.totalReviews || 0, color: 'yellow', link: '/reviews' } ]; const vendorStats = [ { icon: ShoppingBag, label: 'Products Listed', value: userProducts?.total || 0, color: 'blue', link: '/marketplace' }, { icon: Users, label: 'Services Offered', value: userServices?.total || 0, color: 'green', link: '/marketplace' }, { icon: TrendingUp, label: 'Total Sales', value: 'â‚¹12,450', color: 'purple', link: '/sales' }, { icon: Star, label: 'Average Rating', value: user?.rating?.toFixed(1) || '4.5', color: 'yellow', link: '/reviews' } ]; const currentStats = user?.role === 'vendor' || user?.role === 'guide' ? vendorStats : stats; return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

{user?.role === 'vendor' || user?.role === 'guide' ? 'Manage your business and grow your reach' : 'Plan your next adventure in Jharkhand' }

{/* Stats Grid */}
{currentStats.map((stat, index) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (

{stat.value}

{stat.label}

); })}
{/* Recent Itineraries */}

Recent Itineraries

Create New
{userItineraries?.itineraries?.length > 0 ? (
{userItineraries.itineraries.slice(0, 3).map((itinerary) => (

{itinerary.title}

{itinerary.status}

{itinerary.description}

{itinerary.duration.days} days {itinerary.travelers.adults + itinerary.travelers.children} travelers
View â†’
))}
) : (

No itineraries yet

Start planning your first trip to Jharkhand

Plan Your Trip
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Plan New Trip

Create an AI-powered itinerary

Explore Destinations

Discover new places in Jharkhand

Browse Marketplace

Shop local handicrafts and services

{(user?.role === 'vendor' || user?.role === 'guide') && (

Add New Listing

List your products or services

)}
{/* Recent Activity */}

); }; export default Dashboard;
